mapper.insert: { call declare begin INSERT INTO COMMUNITY (COM_SEQ, TITLE, NICKNAME, CONTENT, REGDATE, HIT, LIKES, TYPE) VALUES ((COMMMUNITY_SEQ.NEXTVAL) + 1, #{title}, #{nickname}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 0, 0, 2); INSERT INTO COMM_INTERIOR (COM_SEQ, FILE_IMAGE) VALUES ((select NVL(MAX(com_seq),0)from community), #{file_image}); END }
mapper.update: { call declare begin UPDATE COMMUNITY SET (#{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE) WHERE COM_SEQ = #{com_seq}; UPDATE COMM_INTERIOR (FILE_IMAGE) SET (#{file_image}) WHERE COM_SEQ = #{com_seq}; END }
mapper.select: SELECT C.COM_SEQ, C.TITLE, C.NICKNAME, C.CONTENT, C.REGDATE, C.HIT, C.LIKES, I.FILE_IMAGE FROM COMMUNITY C, COMM_INTERIOR I WHERE C.COM_SEQ = I.COM_SEQ
SELECT C.COM_SEQ, C.TITLE, C.NICKNAME, C.CONTENT, C.REGDATE, C.HIT, C.LIKES, I.FILE_IMAGE FROM COMMUNITY C, COMM_INTERIOR I WHERE C.COM_SEQ = I.COM_SEQ AND C.COM_SEQ = #{com_seq}
